Purpose: To automate the creation of personalized and SEO-optimized marketing content across digital channels, enhancing engagement and accelerating campaign execution.
ExecSummary: Marketing teams face growing pressure to produce high-quality, tailored content for increasingly segmented audiences. Manual copywriting is time-consuming, hard to scale, and limits speed-to-market. This demo shows how a Generative AI engine can dynamically create contextual, brand-aligned marketing copy using LLMs and prompt engineering.
ExecSummaryKeyAsks: Automate generation of marketing content for products and promotions
Ensure consistency across SEO, email, and ad copy
BusinessObjectives: Accelerate campaign launches with AI-generated content
Support A/B testing with on-demand variations
Drive brand consistency and quality at scale
Empower marketers with prompt-based copy generation
BusinessBenefits: Up to 70% faster content production lifecycle
Consistent brand tone across all channels
overview: This solution showcases a GenAI-powered content engine tailored for marketing teams. It combines prompt templates, large language models, and simple APIs to generate SEO-rich, channel-specific marketing content dynamically. It can be integrated into content management systems or marketing automation pipelines.
business: Retail and media sectors require frequent, high-volume, and tailored copy for products, offers, blogs, and social content. Manual writing slows down launches and introduces inconsistency. By introducing an AI co-writer, teams can speed up go-to-market timelines while maintaining brand voice.
approach: The system uses Mistral-7B as the core LLM with domain-tuned prompt templates. Flask provides a lightweight API for integration. Marketers can input product specs or goals, and the system generates optimized copy for landing pages, emails, or social posts.
BusinessDrivers: Rapid iteration for A/B testing and localization
Marketing ops automation with minimal IT dependency
Reducing creative bottlenecks in campaign planning
BusinessChallanges: Difficulty maintaining consistent tone and SEO alignment
Limited ability to personalize across demographics
High dependency on external creative teams or agencies
FunctionalOverview: Input form or API to provide product/category/context info
Prompt template selector based on campaign type (e.g., email, SEO, PPC)
Feedback loop to refine and regenerate content

FunctionalComponentDetails.Description: Takes structured product or campaign inputs and produces optimized copy for various channels.
BusinessImpact: Cuts down time to generate ad/email copy
Empowers marketers with self-service content creation

FunctionalComponentDetails.Description: Houses modular prompt structures for different marketing scenarios.
KeyFeatures: Predefined templates for social media, blogs, product descriptions, and ads
BusinessImpact: Improves content alignment with business goals

SolutionOverview: Mistral-7B model hosted via API backend (Flask)
Prompt templating layer for brand-compliant generation
Optional scoring/ranking module for content effectiveness
Integration hooks into CMS, CRM, or campaign automation systems
dataflow: Marketer inputs campaign requirements through a UI or API. Prompt template is selected based on content type. The prompt is merged with input data and passed to the Mistral LLM. Generated content is optionally scored and previewed before being published or exported.
design: The system is built as a modular service with stateless API components. It can scale horizontally and plug into CI/CD flows or martech stacks. All templates are stored in version-controlled repositories to ensure traceability and compliance.

cost.CAPEX: 30,000 - covers LLM tuning, backend setup, and UI development
cost.OPEX: 3,000/month - includes model inference, hosting, and support
